Hello all!

November 20, 2015

My name is Jacob Albers, I’m a recent Computer Science graduate from the University of Chicago. This will be a blog where I’ll collect and output various thoughts on the stuff that interests me. At this time, here are a few things that I’m thinking of putting up and talking about:

Computer Science

I’ll be putting up some posts on computer science related topics, that will probably include some of the following points of interest:

  • Data Visualization using D3.js
  • Functional Programming Languages: particularaly Elm and Haskell
  • Building useful applications with Functional Programming Languages
  • Computational Neuroscience: I’m still barely know anything in this area - will update!

Other Academic Stuff?

I might also talk about interesting topics in other fields that I enjoy looking at - these might include the following items

  • Biology: I’m particularly interested (and want to get back to learning more at some point) about some areas of biology including cellular and developmental signaling, Endocrinology, and Neuroscience
  • Economics: Around the areas of venture funding and business development
  • Statistics: Still learning more about this stuff! These may be meshed with some CS project that I will be working on - stay tuned!

Fun Stuff

I might also be putting up a bunch of not so serious things. Some of the things that I’m currently thinking about:

  • Food recipes that I’ll be trying out
  • Updates on Shadowrun or Diplomacy games that I’m currently taking part in
  • If I work up the courage, may be some art pieces that I’ve made

Looking forward to a bright future for this blog!

-Jacob
